title: How to heal my account  ?
body:
I'm an idiot who was toxic and got a 14 day ban.
I know that after a 14 day ban the next punishment is a perma ban (which i dont want).
So my question is: how do i heal my account and prevent harsher punishments ?
How do i drop my punishment level to chat restrictions again ? 
I've asked Rito via ticket but they refused to reply to my question, they just replied with their typical "There's no exact number of games you should play or exact date" replies.

replies.body: So essentially the agent was saying that the situation is different for everyone. The amount of games or length of time your account needs to wait is different depending on what the punishment was for.
I don't really know the number, but after a while you will get this message talking about how they noticed your change in behavior and to keep it up
